alert.note: Alert for Lorain (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 19 at 3:34AM EST until December 19 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of less than one inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Lorain county. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions with areas of blowing snow. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will gradually taper off overnight but blowing snow may contribute to slick conditions. The higher snow amounts are expected inland from Lake Erie with much less near the lakeshore. Temperatures will fall into the 20s by sunrise with wind chills in the teens.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
